attributes.action: Abolish the right of all Asylum Seekers to legal aid/public funding to fight a refusal after asylum hearing AND allow only ONE hearing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Far too much public money is wasted on appeals to refusal of Asylum. We see failed appeal after failed appeal, all funded by the british public. This has to stop, and once the answer is 'No', then that person should be immediatelty deported and not taken to holding centres.
No other Country would tolerate such waste, so why should we?
